name: Bleeding Acid
description:
* FULL SCREEN RECOMENDED!!  *

GAME BASICS :

This game bases around the consept of you escaping the acid.

The acid will rise over time, so you'll have to always be on the move.

The game does have a score mechanic , representing the time of survival since the start of the game ( Displayed in seconds ).

CONTROLS : 

A or Left Arrow : Left direction

D or Right Arrow : Right direction

Space : Get the character to jump

CONTACT : 

You can contact the developer via twitter : 

https://twitter.com/RiiiKy_OG
